name: Example Module
description: Example Module Description

name: Example Module Sub-Module
description: Example Module Sub-Module Description

name: Copy Raw
description: Allows you to copy messages as they were when being written.

name: Avatar Data Attribute
description: Adds data attribute to avatar elements, as some CSS tweaks / modules rely on it

name: Custom CSS
description: Allows entering of your own custom CSS in a code editor with syntax highlighting

name: Dev Mode
description: Enables developer mode (experiments, etc.)

name: Fucklytics
description: Blocks Discord (Science) analytics, crash reports and Sentry

name: Disable ping reply
description: Disables Discord automatically pinging when you are replying

name: Silent Typing
description: Makes Discord not send your typing indicator

name: Custom Sounds
description: Allows replacing Discord sounds with your own custom uploaded sounds

name: Discord Debug
description: Setting option with debug information about Discord

name: Egg Scrambler
description: Makes discord unusable by converting all messages into eggs

name: (E x p a n d)Cord
description: M a k e s  d i s c o r d  w i d e

name: Message Scrambler
description: Makes discord unusable by converting all messages into random text

name: OwOCord
description: Makes Discowd mowe owo.

name: RainbowCord
description: Rainbow mode

name: Censor Rude Words
description: Censors rude words which can be toggled in a setting item

name: Copy Raw
description: Allows you to copy messages as they were when being written.

name: Hide Blocked Messages
description: Completely hides blocked messages

name: Better Message Deletion
description: Messages only turn red instead of completely disappearing

name: Role Colored Messages
description: Makes message text color the same as the sender's role color

name: Twitch Emotes
description: Converts text into images for Twitch global emotes + BetterTTV emotes

name: Username In Author
description: Adds username to message's author if they have a nickname

name: WYSIWYG Messages
description: Makes messages WYSIWYG-like (like in the message sending box)

name: Clear Recent Games
description: Adds setting button which clears recent games (in "Game Activity")

name: Download Images Shortcut
description: Allows downloading of images by hovering overing them and pressing Ctrl+D

name: Game Activity Button
description: Adds button to account panel which enables / disables game activity (showing what game you are playing), idea and icon from Egrodo's BD plugin

name: Macros
description: Allows setting and sending of macros via /m name [value]

name: Relaunch
description: Easily relaunch Discord, completely. (Press `F4` to relaunch.)

name: Send Button
description: Adds a send button, similair to the mobile application.

name: Bloody Hell Mate
description: Makes everything bloody red, mate!

name: Comfy Theme
description: A simple, customizable, comfy theme. (Ported with the addition of settings by Liam The Protogen.)

name: Couve Theme
description: A new look to discord

name: Custom Theme
description: Choose your own colors for your own theme

name: Darker Theme
description: Darker theme but still with contrast

name: Darkest Theme
description: Pure dark theme

name: Dracula Theme
description: Based on the Dracula color scheme

name: Duvbox Theme
description: Based on the Vim theme, named Gruvbox.

name: "i fixed discord" Theme
description: Makes light theme bearable. (Use in light mode with dark sidebar enabled.)

name: Nord Theme
description: Based on the Nord Theme color scheme, polar night (dark blue with lighter accents)

name: Protoncord
description: A sleek, modern UI inspired by the layout of ProtonVPN.

name: Slate Theme
description: An optimized, consistent, and functional theme for Discord based on GitHub's design language.

name: Solarized Dark Theme
description: Based on the Solarized Dark color scheme

name: Splendid Theme
description: An absolutely splendid theme.

name: Better Channel Indicators
description: Adds a nice touch to Discord's current channel indicators.

name: Better NSFW
description: Blurs content in NSFW channels.

name: Bottom Bar
description: A nice, simple looking, bottom bar. Inspired by CapnKitten's Spotify Discord theme.

name: De-Nitro
description: Removes everything Nitro related.

name: Fullscreen Inbox
description: Makes the inbox appear as if it's a channel

name: Gradient Buttons
description: Add some spice to your buttons with gradients!

name: Hardcoded Color Fixer
description: Changes hardcoded colors to variables - improves themes

name: Hide Clyde
description: Hides all Clyde messages completely

name: Hide Message
description: Adds a hide message option to all message's context menus which temporarily hides it

name: Hide Quick Reactions
description: Hides the quick reactions (top 4 emoji) on the message context menus

name: Horizontal Server List
description: Moves the server list from the left to the top of Discord.

name: Nicer User Connections
description: Adds a bit of a boom-shaka-laka to those user connections.

name: Nickname Panel
description: Shows nickname in account panel instead of username (but still username on hover), idea based on Zerebos' BD plugin "AccountDetailsPlus"

name: No Notes
description: Hides the notes on user profile modals. (Does not apply to the user popout.)

name: Overlay User Panel
description: Overlays user panel buttons (mute, deafen, etc.) to above the user panel to the right

name: Better Animations
description: Adds animations to a bunch of stuff.

name: RadialStatus
description: Changes the status icons to wrap around the avatar.

name: RevampedUserArea
description: A compact, better looking user area.

name: Server Count
description: Shows how many servers you're in.

name: Show All Activities
description: See every status a user has enabled.

name: Simple Status Icons
description: Makes all status icons circular instead of shapes for Idle and Do Not Disturb (but keeps mobile a phone outline)

name: Sticky Notes
description: Allows you to create temporary sticky notes on the screen. Open new sticky notes with Ctrl+D or the New Note button.

name: Toggle Message Buttons
description: Toggles whether the buttons on the message box should appear. (Right click the message box to toggle.)

name: User Popout Creation Date
description: Adds user's creation date to popouts

name: Usrbg - Default
description: [Default Snippets] A pure CSS database of user requested backgrounds for Discord.

name: Usrbg - Headers
description: [Header Snippets by Ducko] A pure CSS database of user requested backgrounds for Discord.

name: VC Columns
description: A column UI with larger buttons for VC

name: Visual Tweaks
description: A variety of minor visual tweaks

name: VSCode-like Toasts
description: Makes GooseMod toasts similar to VSCode's (in the bottom right above the message box and larger)

name: Webhook Tags
description: Replace bot tags with webhook tags for webhook messages.
